lines: 1. Keduru , Jo ka Yesu,Jokedo mag Kristo;Keluru kuodi magu,Makuru tong` gi luth.Yesu Jageng`a marwa,Otelonwa maber;Weuru luoro duto,Keduru ka mager.
2. Keduru, jo ka Yesu,Wasigu marwa kwiny;To Yesu En kokonywaWanyalo loyo en;Satani ni wasiguMadwaro negowa;To ka walu bang` YesuWabiro hewo en.
3. Keduru, jo ka Yesu,Ndalo odong` matin;Tinde wadhi kedo,Kiny wadhi weyo lwenyMohewo e moyudoE polo gik mathoth;To nyaka chieng` e polo,Osiko kodi Ruoth.
